item.title: About me
item.description: What floats my boat Following Jesus Best. Wife. Ever. Raising three incredible giant killers I also like Telling stories in a creative way (AKA working in tech) Music! Particularly playing drums or the guitar <3 Winning. Especially in Chess. Not too fond of, though Long "about" pages
